channel.title: Posts on Hugo tranquilpeak theme
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugo tranquilpeak theme

item.title: Problema 1 - Checkpoint 1 - Nossa pergunta
item.description: library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(readr) theme_set(theme_minimal()) Descrição dos dados O conjunto de dados a ser estudado aqui, reune informações sobre a avaliação dada no IBDM de algumas séries populares na atualidade. Os dados foram coletados através de métodos descritos aqui. A base da dados contêm informações de cada episódio da série, sua avaliação no IBDM, o número de votos recebidos por cada episódio e as proporções de votos de 1 a 10 para cada episódio.

item.title: Problema 1 - Checkpoint 4 - Relatório Final
item.description: library(tidyr) library(dplyr) library(readr) library(ggplot2) theme_set(theme_minimal()) series <- read_csv("series_from_imdb.csv") O episódios season finale são considerados melhores que os demais? Os episódios que encerram as temporadas são os que costumam causar mais frisson, em geral eles são repletos de suspense, reviravoltas, drama e tudo mais que prenda a nossa atenção e nos deixe sedentos pela próxima temporada. Mas será que as séries estão conseguindo realmente fazer isso? Será que esses episódios são melhores que os demais?

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Welcome to Tranquilpeak 0.4.3-BETA
item.description: Tranquilpeak is a gorgeous responsive theme for Hugo blog framework. It has many features and integrated services to improve user experience.

item.title: Elements showcase
item.description: Check out how Tranquilpeak theme display well HTML elements (title, paragraph, blockquote, table and more..). It’s simple and elegant.

item.title: Cover image showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak integrate a unique “cover image” feature. Open this post to see how this feature sublimate your article.

item.title: highlighted code showcase
item.description: Tranquilpeak Hugo theme have its own theme to highlight source code. It’s based on GitHub theme: simple and elegant. Check out how it sublimate source codes.

item.title: Tags plugins showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how tag plugins are displayed. See docs for more info.

item.title: Hidden social section showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the social section is hidden.

item.title: Hidden tag section showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the tag section is hidden.

item.title: Hidden pagination showcase
item.description: This post is used to show how a site looks if the pagination is hidden.

item.title: Video integrations showcase
item.description: Youtube and Vimeo videos are easily integrated thanks to tags plugins. Of course, you can add video other platforms like dailymotion.

item.title: 中文測試
item.description: This is a chinese test post to show you how chinese is displayed.

item.title: 日本語テスト
item.description: This is a Japanese test post to show you how japanese is displayed.

Problema 1 - Checkpoint 4 - Relatório Final code{white-space: pre;} pre:not([class]) { background-color: white; } if (window.hljs && document.readyState && document.readyState === "complete") { window.setTimeout(function() { hljs.initHighlighting(); }, 0); } h1 { font-size: 34px; } h1.title { font-size: 38px; } h2 { font-size: 30px; } h3 { font-size: 24px; } h4 { font-size: 18px; } h5 { font-size: 16px; } h6 { font-size: 12px; } .
